title: THERE IS NO WAY THOUSAND OF CIVILIANS KILLED SARATH FONSEKA TELLS THE BBC
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Sri Lanka Army’s former commander  Sarath Fonseka rejected accusations that thousands of civilians had been killed in the closing phase of the army’s offensive against the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam in an interview with BBC’s Charles Haviland in Colombo…..
